publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4087 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to Sharon Colman on her Oscar Nomination—That the Parliament congratulates Sharon Colman on her Oscar nomination for "Badgered" in the category of Best Animated Short Film; believes that she exemplifies the very best of new Scottish talent; considers that her parents, her local community in Haldane and her former school, the Vale of Leven Academy are justly proud of her achievements, and believes that for Sharon the best is yet to come.
S2M-4087 Congratulations to Sharon Colman on her Oscar Nomination (lodged on 8 March 2006) Michael Matheson*

S2M-4087 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to Sharon Colman on her Oscar Nomination—That the Parliament congratulates Sharon Colman on her Oscar nomination for "Badgered" in the category of Best Animated Short Film; believes that she exemplifies the very best of new Scottish talent; considers that her parents, her local community in Haldane and her former school, the Vale of Leven Academy are justly proud of her achievements, and believes that for Sharon the best is yet to come. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Murray Tosh*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Bruce Crawford*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Bill Butler*, Shiona Baird*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Sandra White*, Marlyn Glen*
S2M-4087 Congratulations to Sharon Colman on her Oscar Nomination (lodged on 8 March 2006) Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Paul Martin*, Alex Neil*, Eleanor Scott*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4087 Congratulations to Sharon Colman on her Oscar Nomination (lodged on 8 March 2006) Karen Gillon*
S2M-4087 Congratulations to Sharon Colman on her Oscar Nomination (lodged on 8 March 2006) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-4087 Congratulations to Sharon Colman on her Oscar Nomination (lodged on 8 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4087 Congratulations to Sharon Colman on her Oscar Nomination (lodged on 8 March 2006) Frances Curran*
